title: Login issue
description: User unable to log into the dashboard with valid credentials.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Transaction fails during checkout with error code 502.

title: Unable to reset password
description: Password reset link not being sent to the user's email.

title: Slow loading dashboard
description: Dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load after login.

title: Email notifications not received
description: User is not receiving email alerts for account activity.

title: Bug in mobile app
description: App crashes when navigating to settings page.

title: Search function not working
description: Search bar returns no results for valid queries.

title: Error during checkout
description: Checkout button does not respond after adding items.

title: Profile picture upload failed
description: System rejects valid image formats on profile update.

title: Data export issue
description: Exported CSV contains incomplete data rows.
